prerequisite: Any teleportation at-will or encounter power, training in Stealth
name: Shadow Dancer
text: You embrace the darkness as a means of perfecting the teleportation ability that quickly becomes your trademark in combat. When you strike like living shadow, you leave your foes to wonder where you might appear next.

features.dancer'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, you can teleport up to 5 squares as a free action before or after the attack
features.dancer'sAmbush(11thLevel): Whenever you teleport during your turn, you gain combat advantage for the next attack roll you make before the end of your turn
features.shadowyTendrils(11thLevel): You gain the shadowy tendrils power
features.shadowStalk(12thLevel): You gain the shadow stalk power
features.lingeringShadows(16thLevel): If you are hidden from a creature at the start of its turn, you are invisible to that creature until the end of its turn
features.trailOfShadows(20thLevel): You gain the trail of shadows power
